sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Layout, Row, Col, List, Typography, Button, Icon } from 'antd' import DetailSlider from '../components/DetailSlider'; import { hotels, blog } from "../utils" const { Text, Title } = Typography const { Content } = Layout const products = [ { id: '1', label: 'Nutella' }, { id: '2', label: 'Pane' }, { id: '3', label: 'Latte' } ]; export const Details = ({ match }) => { const hotel = hotels.find(item => item.id == match.params.id); console.log("hotel", hotel, match.params.id) return ( <span style={{ textTransform: 'capitalize' }} >{hotel.name}</span> {hotel.name} 70000 ) } export default Details
